text: Phira asim unham lokam nu kitaba da varisa bana'i'a jinham nu asim apane badi'am vicom cuna li'a si. So unham vicom kujha apane apa upara zulama karana vale hana ate unham vicom him kujha vicakarale raha te hana. Ate unham vicom kujha alaha di kirapa nala cage kamam vica age jana vale hana. Iha sabha tom vadi kirapa hai
